OOC: I hope that this post solve the baby's trouble... :) 'cause the 
first store will openen acording with rpg's cronology in several 
centuries. BTW this is the most strangle post that I've done.

Starice/Khonkolor:

All baby's behavoir made a Starice a clue what the baby needed... 
MILK! but how get some milk? Starice knew that Khonkolor loved drink 
milk (he was a big cat after all) and that before they arrived, he 
had kept in the ship several milk's bottles.

Starice opened her com link "Khonkolor, I was wondering if you can 
let me take some milk's bottles..."

"Is it for the baby isn't?" replied Khonkolor "I've heard the news 
when you told it to Epyon... well go to this part of the ship (he 
gave her the datums) and type this password... take all that you 
need."

"Thanks" Said Starice, took the baby in arm and kissed her 
forehead "come little one, you will dinner soon..."

She left the lab with the baby.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> BB: Sorry I'm so late on posting, guys. Had dinner with friends.
> 
> Whimpers came from the kit when she couldn't feed, her tiny tummy 
grumbling 
> with an empty sound.
> The sound of the thing that was holding her wasn't mommy and she 
was 
> confused. Where was the warm side and milk her brain was trying to 
find?
> She was starting to make tiny yipps when she was suddenly washed, 
> remembering how her mothers tongue use to run over her back and she 
became 
> quiet, thinking mommy had come back.
> And on reaction she tried to find the war side and suckle but there 
was 
> nothing there! Mommy was just there, where was she again?
> The she-kit turned a bit in Starice's arms, thinking that the warm 
side was 
> just behind her where it usually was when it wasn't in front.
> But it wasn't there either!
> Milk! Where was milk? Where there was milk there was mommy.
> By this time Starice had taken the kit to the lab, and all the 
sounds 
> confusing the baby and making her mew/whine.
> (mews are little whimpering sounds for the baby)
> Now time passed and before and knew it something strange smelling 
was put by 
> her nose (e-cubes + o-food). She didn't know what it was so she 
sniffed the 
> cubes, the smell not registering in her mind as something she could 
eat but 
> when her nose touched a cube sitting on top another one the jerky 
movements 
> of her body made it fall off, surprising her and she yipped.
> Drawing back into Starice's arms she cuddled into them, trying to 
hide from 
> what made the scary sound. But soon she became brave since there 
was no more 
> of the sound and moved in Starice's arms again, suddenly bumping 
her nose on 
> her fingers.
> The shape of their tips reminded her of her mother's teats  and she 
opened 
> her tiny mouth, trying to suckle from them.
> Her mind thinking milk again. Her itty-bitty paws moved unsteadily 
towards 
> the sides of Starice's hand, trying to massage the milk from 
mommy's side.
> 
> 
>
